author: jvanzyl
msg: o cleaning up the maven descriptors for the projects so that a site
with decent names is generated (link to come)
o made all the projects use a LICENSE.txt file. one this doesn't wig
out windows users and the checkstyle report likes to have one to
make sure that all sources files have a license present so if they
don't it can be reported.
o using the reactor tag in its first forms to provide a mechanism
to build the entire commons (still problems with detecting
JDK 1.4) and to generate a site where the navigation is gleaned
from the project themselves and don't have to kept in sync
manually.
o added a little front-end site deployer.

author: craigmcc
msg: If a validationQuery property has been established, call
setTestOnBorrow(true) so that the validateObject() method -- which actually
performs the requested test -- will be executed as connections are
requested from the pool.
PR:  Bugzilla #9073
Submitted by:	Alexander Lamm <alexander.lamm at livinglogic.de>

author: craigmcc
msg: Introduce a new exception class DbcpException (subclass of RuntimeException)
that follows the JDK 1.4 pattern of accepting a "root cause" argument (but
without requiring a 1.4 JVM).  Throw a DbcpException wrapping the actual root
cause exception in every case where a generic RuntimeException used to be
thrown.
PR: Bugzilla #9850
Submitted by:	Jonathan Fuerth <fuerth at sqlpower.ca>

author: craigmcc
msg: Add a version-stamped manifest to commons-dbcp.jar.
PR: Bugzilla #10688
Submitted by:	Arnaud Heritier <aheritier at sopragroup.com>
